column2: "Arararara? That unusual person over there, is it you Xiera?"
"Is it fine for the Administrator to be out here instead of being in the Bridge?"
"That's right! That's the right reaction, Lisa! At least you know my position. "
"What's with this exaggerated expression that you're showing? Lisa doesn't understand at all..."
"<%me> and Matoi don't understand the significance of me leaving the Bridge!"
"You're the ARKS Ship Administrator, it's only natural that you're everywhere."
"Leaving that aside, Lisa hasn't heard an answer to Lisa's question yet."
"Ah, uhm... Right now Xiao is on the Bridge and gave me permission to act freely."
"If Xiao is here that means that something important is happening, right?"
"Ah, no, I don't mean it that way..."
"A slight increase in body temperature, an unnatural gaze, you're obviously lying, Xiera."
"And then, and then, and then, because of that, what enemy is it? Where is the enemy anyways?"
"For Xiao to personally come and take command of the situation, the enemy must be quite powerful."
"N-no, that's not..."
"Hehehehe, very obedient and easy to understand."
"Is the enemy this time a Darker? Or is it a new species like that time in Earth? Or maybe something completely different."
"Maybe it's related to the strong stench that's coming out of you."
"Which reminds me, the other day you took an emergency medical checkup, right?"
"My hand, please let go of my hand and stop all these allegations."
"<%me>, please help me!"
"1. That's enough."
"2. You can handle it!"
"Hmm. Well, if you say so, Lisa will leave it at that."
"Lisa doesn't really mind, since Lisa got enough gossip material, so Lisa can leave it at that."
"Lisa is not telling you to not keep secrets, but Lisa doesn't appreciate you hiding interesting things from me."
"Especially that sense of power coming from inside you. Now, that's something that's really interesting. Lisa didn't have that feeling coming from you before."
"With that being said, if there's new information regarding that, please tell me more."
"No, it's not really a fun topic to talk about..."
"Well, it doesn't seem like that we can talk about this any further, so let's end it here."
"But if things get even more interesting please call Lisa, absolutely call Lisa. Hehehehe."
"Even though I'm inside the ARKS ship, I felt my life was in danger for a moment there."
"There really is a big difference between watching a recording and interacting with the person themselves."
